install.name: AcyMailing : share on social networks
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2011 ACYBA SARL - All rights reserved.
install.description: This plugin enables you to add a share icon for social networks

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: picturefb
param.label: Facebook picture
param.description: Picture path used for the facebook icon

param.name: picturetwitter
param.label: Twitter picture
param.description: Picture path used for the twitter icon

param.name: picturelinkedin
param.label: LinkedIn picture
param.description: Picture path used for the LinkedIn icon

param.name: template
param.label: Display the online version
param.description: Select if you want to display the online version (when the user will share your link on the social network) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template
